status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"79q1a","text":"Add the powder to 12.5 ml of Extraction Buffer (EB) 1 in a 50 ml falcon tube. Let sit on ice for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30gj5","text":"Add 1% Formaldehyde for crosslinking (i.e. 338 µl Formaldehyde 37% in 12.5ml of EB1). Incubate 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fllm","text":"Add 1.25 M glycine to stop the crosslinking (i.e. 850ml of Glycine 2M per 338 µl Formaldehyde 37%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qg6v","text":"Filter the solution through Miracloth into a new 50 ml falcon tube. Repeat once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1c6f","text":"Filter the solution through a 0.4µm filter into a new 50 ml falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8vegp","text":"Centrifuge the filtered solution for 20 minutes at 4,000g at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8dfj5","text":"Gently remove supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 2 ml of Extraction Buffer (EB) 2. Transfer the solution into one 1.5ml Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3akce","text":"Centrifuge at 11,000 g for 10 minutes at 4°C. Repeat step 15 \u0026 16 once","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1p7c","text":"Remove supernatant and resuspend pellet in 300µl of Extraction Buffer (EB) 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1b715","text":"In a clean Eppendorf tube, add 300ul of EB3. Take the 300µl solution (resuspended pellet) from step 17 and carefully layer it on top of the clean 300µl of EB3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7c54q","text":"Centrifuge for 45 min at 11,000g at 4 degrees.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r1os","text":"Resuspend chromatin pellet in 300µl Nuclear Preparation Buffer (NPB) and incubate on ice for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63rg0","text":"Spin down nuclei at 1000g for 5 min at 4°C and resuspend in Plant-Tween-Wash-Buffer (PTWB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9sgs","text":"Resuspend pellet in 38 µl 1X rCutSmart, containing 10µl SAM and 6µl EcoGII (i.e. 7.5U for 100µl). Incubate 30 minutes at 30°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dsm","text":"Add  20 µl NaCl (5M) and incubate overnight at 65 °C (or 1h30min  if not crosslinked).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vtbq","text":"Add 5µl of RNAse A (20mg/ml) and 2µl Proteinase K. Incubate 30 minutes at 42°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ok70","text":"Add 1 volume of 1:1 phenol:chloroform (i.e. 400µl) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"appc1","text":"Recover the aqueous phase (upper) in a new LoBind Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ru8d","text":"Add 1 volume of chloroform (i.e. 400µl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"56qs0","text":"Centrifuge at 12,000 g for 10 minutes at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3if4m","text":"Recover aqueous phase (upper) in a new LoBind Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5a6b","text":"Precipitate DNA by adding 1/10 volume of NaAcétate 3M pH5,2 + 2,5 volume of EtOH 100%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aql4h","text":"Incubate at –20°C from 45 minutes to overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8h20a","text":"Centrifuge at 12000g for 30 minutes at 4°C to precipitate DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7k8v2","text":"Wash the pellet with 300µ EtOH 70%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"583l2","text":"Remove EtOH and dry pellets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4cde","text":"Elute in 20µl TE pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fcmas","text":"Centrifuge at 12,000 g for 10 minutes at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5od1o","text":"Sequence during 72h on v9.4.1 flow cell  FLO-MIN106.1 or FLO-PRO002 in MinION or PromethION sequencer, respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a26bo","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hvl1","text":"Extraction Buffer (EB) 1 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c2aj","text":"To prepare 50mlm of fresh EB1 buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brclb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kq9g","text":"   Extraction Buffer (EB) 1for 50 ml:Final Concentration2M sucrose10 ml 0.4M 1M Tris-HCl pH 80.5 ml10mM 1M  MgCl20.5ml 10mM14.3M  BME17.5 µl 5mM+ PIs (1 tablet  per 50mls)","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":171}],"data":{}},{"key":"c0gdd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":""},"colTitles":["Component","Amount","Final Concentration"],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["2M Sucrose","10 ml","0.4M"],[" 1M Tris-HCl pH 8","0.5 ml","10mM "],["1M  MgCl2","0.5ml ","10mM"],["14.3M 2-mercaptoethanol","17.5 µl ","5mM"],["+ PIs (1 tablet  per 50mls)","",""]],"guid":"66AD4AB117C846E7B70223DFE33C5772","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["2M Sucrose","10 ml","0.4M"],[" 1M Tris-HCl pH 8","0.5 ml","10mM "],["1M  MgCl2","0.5ml ","10mM"],["14.3M 2-mercaptoethanol","17.5 µl ","5mM"],["+ PIs (1 tablet  per 50mls)","",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"av39n","text":"Extraction Buffer (EB) 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8begl","text":"To prepare 4ml of fresh EB2 :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckt1h","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a65jd","text":"   2Msucrose500 µL sucrose 0.25M 1M Tris-HCl pH 840 µL Tris HCl pH8 10mM 1M MgCl240 µL MgCl2 10mM 20% Triton X-100200 µL Triton 1% 14.3M BME1,4 µL BME5mM PIs (1 mini-tablet diluted in 1 ml)400 µL Mini complete Pi'sH202818,6 µL H2O","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":230}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqs0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":""},"colTitles":["Component","Amount","Final Concentration"],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["14.3M 2-mercaptoethanol","1,4 µL ","5mM "],["20% Triton X-100","200 µL ","1% "],["H20","2818,6 µL ",""],["1M MgCl2","40 µL ","10mM "],["1M Tris-HCl pH 8","40 µL ","10mM "],["PIs (1 mini-tablet diluted in 1 ml)","400 µL ",""],["2M Sucrose","500 µl","0.25M"]],"guid":"ACDAF5994C1949BA8B22F4358F3F0351","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["14.3M 2-mercaptoethanol","1,4 µL ","5mM "],["20% Triton X-100","200 µL ","1% "],["H20","2818,6 µL ",""],["1M MgCl2","40 µL ","10mM "],["1M Tris-HCl pH 8","40 µL ","10mM "],["PIs (1 mini-tablet diluted in 1 ml)","400 µL ",""],["2M Sucrose","500 µl","0.25M"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6q3o6","text":"Extraction Buffer (EB) 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nvaa","text":" To prepare 3ml of fresh EB 3 :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkri4","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43b1u","text":"   Extraction Buffer (EB) 33 mLFinal Concentration2M sucrose2550 µL sucrose 1.7M 1M  Tris-HCl pH 830 µL Tris HCl pH810mM  20% Triton X-10025 µL Triton0.15%  1M MgCl26 µL MgCl22mM BME1,05 µL BME 5mM + Pis (1 mini-tablet diluted in 1 ml)300 µL Mini complete Pi'sH20 to volume90,3µL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":280}],"data":{}},{"key":"1g0a7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","7_2":""},"colTitles":["Component","Amount","Final Concentration"],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[[" 1M  Tris-HCl pH 8","30 µL ","10mM "],[" 1M MgCl2","6 µL ","2mM "],[" 20% Triton X-100","25 µL ","0.15% "],["+ Pis (1 mini-tablet diluted in 1 ml)","300 µL ",""],["2M sucrose","2550 µL ","1.7M"],["","1,05 µL  ","5mM "],["H20 to volume","90,3µL ",""]],"guid":"C767FF8160134098B688B7375F613C7E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[[" 1M  Tris-HCl pH 8","30 µL ","10mM "],[" 1M MgCl2","6 µL ","2mM "],[" 20% Triton X-100","25 µL ","0.15% "],["+ Pis (1 mini-tablet diluted in 1 ml)","300 µL ",""],["2M sucrose","2550 µL ","1.7M"],["","1,05 µL  ","5mM "],["H20 to volume","90,3µL ",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

title: Protocol SAM-Seq  Zea Mays
